name: Everything On It
description:
Created for Game Breaker's Tool Kit 8. The theme of this jam is "everything". So, my thinking was, "let's make an SRPG with SRPG Studio, that has EVERYTHING in it."

So, you'll find just about every class and every skill in this game. It's not balanced in the slightest and probably overwhelms the player with way too much information - but then, that's half the fun, because this is one map with Everything On It!
